Professor, you can’t publish all of my writings for the whole world to see!

As soon as I see him we’re gonna have to talk

about this.

Sir,

there’s been

a problem!

To double-check

the longitudinal measurements we took previously the Captain

says we have to go back

to Brazil!

It can’t be!

No, I can’t stand being on the open sea any more!

After returning to Brazil once more and finishing all of its assigned orders, the Beagle braved stormy weather to finally arrive back in England on

October 2, 1836.

It’s been 4 years,

9 months, and

5 days since I left.

129
